Description: Customer messaging apps for sales, marketing, and support, connected on one platform.
Name: Intercom

Methods.Name: Get Conversation
Methods.Description: Get a full conversation.

Methods.Name: List Conversations By User ID
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations by a users ID.

Methods.Name: List Conversations By User Email
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations by a users email.

Methods.Name: List New Conversations By User Email
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations by a users email since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List New Conversations By User ID
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations by a users ID since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List New Conversations
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Conversation IDs
Methods.Description: Gets a list IDs from all conversations.  Useful when retrieving a large number of Conversations and you only require the Conversation IDs.

Methods.Name: List Recently Closed Conversations By Admin ID
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all the conversations closed by an admin since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Reply to a Conversation
Methods.Description: Reply to a conversation with a message from an admin or on behalf of a contact, or with a note for admins.

Methods.Name: List Conversations
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations.

Methods.Name: List Articles
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all articles.

Methods.Name: Check Job Status
Methods.Description: Check to see whether your export is ready for download. All jobs that have completed processing (and are thus available to download from the provided URL) will have an expiry limit of two days from when the export job completed. After this, the data will no longer be available.

Methods.Name: Create Export Job
Methods.Description: Contains the total counts of information for a workspace.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Data
Methods.Description: This is the link to download your data in a csv format.

Methods.Name: List Segments
Methods.Description: Returns a full listing of Segments.

Methods.Name: Get Segment
Methods.Description: Returns details of the specifed Segment.

Methods.Name: List Workspace Total Count
Methods.Description: Contains the total counts of information for a workspace.

Methods.Name: User Tagged
Methods.Description: Triggered when a user is tagged.

Methods.Name: Conversation User Replied
Methods.Description: Triggered when a user replies to a conversation.

Methods.Name: User Untagged
Methods.Description: Triggered when a user is untagged.

Methods.Name: Conversation User Created
Methods.Description: Triggered when a user creates a conversation.

Methods.Name: Conversation Note Added
Methods.Description: Triggered when a note is added to a conversation.

Methods.Name: User Created
Methods.Description: Triggered when a new user is created in Intercom.

Methods.Name: Company Created
Methods.Description: Triggered when a new company is created.

Methods.Name: Conversation Closed
Methods.Description: Triggered when a conversation is closed.

Methods.Name: Tag Converstaion By ID
Methods.Description: Attaches a tag specified by Tag ID to a conversation.

Methods.Name: List Tags
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all Tags.

Methods.Name: Tag Converstaion By Name
Methods.Description: Attaches a tag specified by name to a conversation.

Methods.Name: Get Tag
Methods.Description: Returns details of the specified Tag.

Methods.Name: Add Tag
Methods.Description: Creates a new Tag.

Methods.Name: Create a Note
Methods.Description: Notes allow you to annotate and comment on your users.

Methods.Name: Get Note
Methods.Description: Retains details of a Note.

Methods.Name: List Notes for User
Methods.Description: Lists the Notes for the spcified user.

Methods.Name: Get Contact by Email
Methods.Description: Returns details of the specified user by email address.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single contact by ID.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of contacts.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a contact.

Methods.Name: Get Me
Methods.Description: Returns the name, email and app ID of the current authorised admin.

Methods.Name: List Admins
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Admins.

Methods.Name: Get Admin
Methods.Description: Returns details of the specified Admin.

Methods.Name: Set Admin Away
Methods.Description: Set an admin to away.

Methods.Name: Create Data Attribute
Methods.Description: Creates a data attribute.

Methods.Name: Update Data Attribute
Methods.Description: Updates a data attribute.

Methods.Name: List Data Attributes
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of data attributes.

Methods.Name: Webhook Accept
Methods.Description: Receives a webhook from Intercom.

Methods.Name: Webhook Post
Methods.Description: Reposts an Intercom webhook.

Methods.Name: Get Team
Methods.Description: Get the details of the specified Team.

Methods.Name: List Teams
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all Teams.

Methods.Name: Get Company
Methods.Description: Gets the details of the specified Customer.

Methods.Name: List Companies
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Companies.
